questions.name: What do you need to improve?
rows: Using pauses and changing the pace of your speech to help engage listeners
Using your body to help convey confidence and to reinforce your message
Remembering what you have to say
Preparing and structuring the content of your talk
Being yourself in front of an audience
Answering audience questions and dealing with interruptions
Understanding your own strengths and weaknesses and having the confidence to work on them
